column2: "Hom mbra ma yɛntow ndwom mma EWURADZE: Hom mma yɛmbɔ ose mma hɛn nkwagye botan no."

column3: Hom mma yɛmbɔ ose ntow ndwom mma no."
Na Ɔhen kɛse bɔ enyame nyina do."

column2: "Ne nsamu na asaase do ebun wɔ; Mbepɔw do sorɔnsorɔmbea so yɛ nedze."
"Po yɛ nedze na ɔno na ɔyɛe; Na ne nsa na ɔhyehyɛɛ asaase kɛsɛɛ."
"Hom mbra ma yɛnkotow na yɛmbɔ hɛn mu adze
column3: Hom mma yɛmbu ntwɛr wɔ EWURADZE hɛn Yɛfo enyim."
Na hɛn dze yɛyɛ n'edzidzibea do nkorɔfo
column5: sɛ nkyɛ ndɛ hom betsie ne ndze a!"

column4: Dɛ Massa da no wɔ sar no do:"
wɔ aber a nna woehu mo ndwuma so."

column2: "Mfe eduanan koraa na mbasantsen no yii me awerɛhow
column4: Ɔman a wɔfom wɔ hɔn akoma mu nye hɔn
